name: Process over product
description:
This NFT isn’t a final artistic product, but rather a representation of our never-ending process of development. The type of dance in this video is a technique we’ve developed for training, and wouldn’t necessarily be used for the kind of finished choreographic work we produce. While dance class is for training, it’s also how we’ve always paid for our company, dancers, and ourselves -- and it’s how we connect with and provide for the community regularly. For us, class and NFTs provide more sustainable funding options that work cyclically through connection with a community. In this way, this NFT is representative of our value of process and the acknowledgement for our community. 

20% of the profits from this NFT sale will go to dancers and cameraperson (who is also a dancer). 

We’re also selling this NFT for the price of class - and as a ticket to class - so we can encourage more dancers to join the community as buyers and to familiarize them with the process as well as utilize NFTs as a unique and secure ticketing mechanism.
